title: RoxyBit - Bring clients for business
description:
Bring new clients to your business with smart content distribution! ROXYBIT is a platform to: Plan, Create, and Distribute content. Gain audience insights and attract new clients using high-engagement social media content tailored to narrow niche audiences.

Find audience based on your product
Find audience triggers, pain points
Create list of topics interested to this particular audience
Create content using AI or manual mode based on topic
Schedule auto-publishing
